words.definition: An alley is a narrow road behind houses or buildings.
words.example: The GS we walked through the alley to the back of the building.

words.definition: An ax is a tool used to cut wood.
words.example: She used an ax to cut some wood for the fire.

words.definition: A bunch is a group of the same things.
words.example: She was hungry, so she ate the entire bunch of grapes.

words.definition: A chore is a job that you have to do but don’t like.
words.example: It’s Nikki’s chore to do the dishes every Tuesday night.

words.definition: When something is decent, it is OK or good enough.
words.example: Eric did a decent job of painting the fence.

words.definition: Disgrace is a feeling of shame.
words.example: He felt a sense of disgrace after failing his big exam.

words.definition: The elbow is the middle part of a person’s arm.
words.example: She pointed to her elbow.

words.definition: When you are grateful, you are happy with something you have received.
words.example: The Gs she was grateful to her friend for the gift.

words.definition: To irritate someone means to annoy them.
words.example: She was irritated by the loud noise.

words.definition: To kid is to make a joke to make someone believe something which is not true.
words.example: I am not lying; I am just kidding.

words.definition: When something is loose, it is not held in place tightly.
words.example: The GS the screw was loose, so it fell out.

words.definition: To offend someone means to make them angry or upset.
words.example: They were offended by what she said.

words.definition: When something happens overnight, it happens during the night.
words.example: The GS the plane flew overnight to London.

words.definition: To persist means to keep doing something even when it is hard.
words.example: He persisted in his studies until he finished.

words.definition: A pine is a type of tree that is tall and has thin leaves.
words.example: There were many pine trees in the forest.

words.definition: A scar is a mark on the skin after a cut has healed.
words.example: The GS he had a scar on his cheek from the accident.

words.definition: A sensation is a feeling a person gets from their senses.
words.example: Mom got a sensation of warmth from the fire.

words.definition: A sled is a small vehicle used on snow.
words.example: The GS the boy was riding his sled down the hill.

words.definition: To tease someone means to laugh at or make fun of them.
words.example: Jake teased Charlie because he was shorter.

words.definition: A valentine is a card you send to someone you love on February 14th.
words.example: Harry wanted to send a valentine to his girlfriend.
